title: American_Top_40_1977_August_20th
description:
American Top 40 with Casey Kasem aired on radio from July 4, 1970 until August 6, 1988. This is a recording of a rebroadcast from internet radio.

In this broadcast:

Casey answers the question, "Who has been the most successful husband and wife team in chart history?"

In the history of the charts, only two artists have ever hit number one with Oscar winning songs two times. One was Bing Crosby, and the other is in this countdown.

A listener wants to know, "What Canadian artist was the first to hit number one on the American charts?"

Casey answers the question, "What's been the biggest hit on the soul chart so far in the 70's?"

A listener asks the question, "Has there ever been a double-sided hit record where each side hit number one on its own?" Casey says it's happened only once in the rock era.
